bibl.title: The Ptolemaic Papyri of Homer.
bibl.seg: West Stephanie, The Ptolemaic Papyri of Homer. (Papyrologica Coloniensia. III.)
Köln - Opladen, Westdeutscher Verlag, 1967, 8°, 294 pp. et 4 pll.

C.R. par Hans Georg Gundel, Gymnasium 76 (1969) pp. 54-55. - Dario Del Corno, RivFil 3a s., 98 (1970) pp. 205-208. - W.J. Verdenius, Mnemosyne 4e s., 24 (1971) p. 94. - Pierre Chantraine, RPhil 3e s., 43 (1969) pp. 295-296. - Frederick M. Combellack, CP 64 (1969) pp. 248-249. - J. Pegueroles, StPap 8 (1969) pp. 78-79. - Mark Naoumides, AJP 91 (1970) pp. 375-378. - Günter Poethke, DLZ 89 (1968) coll. 882-884. - Sergio Daris, Aegyptus 46 (1966) p. 301. - Hans Joachim Mette, Gnomon 41 (1969) pp. 499-500. - Jacques Schwartz, RBPhil 46 (1968) p. 1432. - N.G. Wilson, CR N.S., 19 (1969) pp. 232-234.
